meanings.definition: To take for granted or without proof.
meanings.sent2: He assumes the bus will arrive on time.
meanings.sent3: The cat assumes the box is its new bed.
meanings.sent4: The sun assumes its position in the sky each morning.
meanings.sent5: The teacher assumes students will complete their homework.

meanings.sent1: He assumes responsibility for the mistake.
meanings.sent2: She assumes the role of team captain.
meanings.sent3: The robot assumes the task of cleaning the house.
meanings.sent4: The superhero assumes the duty of protecting the city.
meanings.sent5: The leader assumes the challenge of guiding the group.

meanings.sent1: The new manager assumes control of the project.
meanings.sent2: They assume ownership of the abandoned house.
meanings.sent3: The puppy assumes the toy as its favorite.
meanings.sent4: The company assumes a new approach to marketing.
meanings.sent5: The plant assumes a different shape as it grows.
